divs: Sighting Detailsufo was on flatbed semitrailor was covered but canvas was loose revealing a ufo there were approx 8 mass state police escorting said vehicle and and bunch of black Chevy suburbans flanking them,they were going a proximately 90 to a 100 miles an hour going north on rte 495 in Lowell just past the connector,heading for pease afb Portsmouth NH I surmised.I tried to pursue but couldn't catch there was no mistaken the craft on the back of the truck as a circus or carnival ride.... it wasn't of this world I am asphalt hauling truckdriver former marine HQBN 1st mar div camp pendeleton ca 81-85. AS god as my witness I know what I saw!!!!!
Summary: ufo was on flatbed semi on rte 495
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lowell
There were no other sightings in Lowell on or around June 9th 2004
